definition: having been disembowelled, take away a vital or essential part of
details:
adjective
- having been disembowelled
verb
- take away a vital or essential part of
= example: take away a vital or essential part of
- remove the entrails of
= synonyms: draw
- remove the contents of
= example: remove the contents of
- surgically remove a part of a structure or an organ
= synonyms: resect
